summary: This is an FBI New York Office document alerting about a planned protest/rally in Thomas Paine Park on December 4, 2021. The protest, organized by several survivor advocacy groups, is in support of and solidarity with the survivors of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Protest/Rally in Solidarity with Epstein Survivors
events.description: A protest/rally is scheduled to take place in Thomas Paine Park from 1pm to 4pm. It is organized by multiple survivor advocacy groups in support of 'Rally for Survivors in Solidarity With the Epstein Survivors.'

locations: Thomas Paine Park (Worth Street & Lafayette Street, New York, NY)
26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY 10278 (FBI New York Division)
keyFacts: A protest in solidarity with Epstein survivors was scheduled for December 4, 2021, in New York City.

The event was organized by a coalition of advocacy groups including 'Survivors Standing with Survivors,' 'FREED Collective,' 'Sexual Assault Advocacy Network,' and 'Coalition Against Trafficking in Women.'
The FBI New York Office disseminated this alert, indicating official monitoring of public activities related to the Epstein case.
The document shows continued public activism and advocacy related to the Epstein case years after his death.
